title: Vogue Williams named St Patrick's Day Grand Marshal
desc: Vogue Williams has been announced as the Grand Marshal for this year's National Saint Patrick's Day Parade.

title: Namibia: A Great Day for Namibian Sport
desc: In a great day for Namibian sport, Nathan Chase and Maja Brinkmann made history as both won gold medals at the Africa Junior Triathlon Championships in Cairo, Egypt, on Friday.

title: Why Maya Moore's net worth doesn't reflect her Hall of Fame legacy
desc: How much is Maya Moore’s net worth? Explore why it doesn't reflect her Hall of Fame legacy and impact on and off the court, including her career choices.

title: Antonio Marras, Intimissimi Owner Reports 4.8% Growth in 2025 Revenue
desc: Italian group Oniverse, the owner of Antonio Marras, Intimissimi and Calzedonia, reached revenues of 3.7 billion euros in 2025.

title: KEVIN MYERS: RTE's miraculous inversion of the news

title: Mainstreaming antimicrobial resistance into primary health care: international workshop report
desc: The Asia-Europe Foundation (ASEF) and the World Health Organization (WHO) organized an international workshop from 18 to 20 March 2025 in Bangkok, Thailand, in close collaboration with the Government of Thailand on mainstreaming antimicrobial resistance (AMR) into primary health care (PHC), to discuss the growing challenge of AMR and targeting core AMR interventions to strengthen PHC-oriented health systems. Funding for the workshop was kindly provided by the Government of Japan through ASEF.

title: Search under way in Wicklow in cases of two missing women
desc: A search is under way in Co Wicklow as part of the investigation into the disappearance and murders of Deirdre Jacob and Jo Jo Dullard in the 1990s.

title: India's trade deficit widens to $34.7 billion in January
desc: Goods imports rose due to gold and silver shipments

title: Murena Teams Up With German Manufacturer to Offer a €698 de-Googled Android Tablet
desc: Featuring 12GB of RAM and a 10,000 mAh battery, this collaboration with Volla brings some decent specs to the privacy-first mobile market.
